GuardBoarsToArms.name: Guard Boars: To Arms!
GuardBoarsToArms.desc: In combat, the guard boars will randomly use a baseball bat, boxing gloves, or a slingshot to automatically attack enemies, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct>.

GuardBoarsSpinningSwing.name: Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!
GuardBoarsSpinningSwing.desc: When Lucy uses the fourth <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, or when she gains the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> status, the guard boars will whirl their baseball bats in a continuous motion, dealing <ct color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</ct> to nearby enemies. If the attack cannot be executed immediately, the guard boars will remember the required number of times to execute it.

desc.2: Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

CheerOn.name: Cheer On!
CheerOn.desc: After using <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, when a guard boar triggers an explosion, it will apply the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> status to all squad members and Bangboo, and the guard boars themselves. While under the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> status, allies' ATK increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>{CAL:13+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*0.8,1,2}%</ct> of Lucy's initial ATK + <ct color=#2BAD00>{CAL:40+AvatarSkillLevel(1)*4,1,2}</ct>, up to a maximum of 600. The <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> status lasts for 10s when a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Line Drive</ct> is hit, and 15s when a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Fly Ball</ct> is hit. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

1.name: Drill Formations
1.desc: When the guard boars launch <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</ct>, Lucy recovers 2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 15s, with each guard boar having its own separate cooldown.

flavor.1: One command, two directions, three cries of pain, and wails all around.

2.name: Little Boar Captain
2.desc: When Lucy uses a <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> or <ct color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</ct>, it grants all squad members and Bangboo, and the guard boars themselves the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> status for 10s.

flavor.0: "Without a doubt, Captain Lucy is the best leader of the Calydon Boar Thirens!"
flavor.1: This was Woody's conclusion in the "Sons of Calydon Annual Report."

3.name: Ironfist Overseer
3.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: "I just wish Captain Lucy would be more gentle when she's smacking us around."
flavor.1: Woody thought, but didn't dare say it out loud.

4.name: Chaos Ball Game
4.desc: While in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> state, allies' CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 10%.
4.flavor: Rules and ribs are made to be broken.

5.name: Wildland Princess
5.desc: <ct color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Dodge</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Assist</ct>, <ct color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</ct>, and <ct color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</ct> Lv. +2

flavor.0: She speaks politely to opponents screaming under her bat.
flavor.1: She apologizes to enemies groveling at her feet.
flavor.2: This is the perfect etiquette of a noble lady.

6.name: Fierce Fangs of Fire
6.desc: When another squad member in the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> state hits an enemy with an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, a guard boar will drop from the sky and cause an explosion, dealing <ct color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</ct> equal to 300% of the guard boar's ATK. This will extend the duration of the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> buff for all squad members and Bangboo, and for the guard boars themselves by 5s. The duration can increase up to 3 times, with a maximum duration of 30s. Refreshing the <ct color=#FFFFFF>Cheer On!</ct> state resets the stack count. After the guard boar's explosion, it will launch <ct color=#FFFFFF>Guard Boars: Spinning Swing!</ct>.

flavor.0: The little boar Thirens known as the Crimson Mane Guard are always at the forefront of battle!
flavor.1: Though it's hard to tell if, at the moment they're launched by the bat, they feel total despair or just accept their fate.
flavor.2: Brave little boars, leading the charge!
